entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Beaver Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:19 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Beaver Island 12:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: 3.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 82 %
Dewpoint: 1.0°C
Wind: NNW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the morning. Fog patches developing in the morning. Amount 10 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning then becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Freezing rain or rain. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Rain changing to freezing rain in the evening then to snow mixed with ice pellets after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
